array.item: Let\'s celebrate family and good food!Please join us for a Dinner.

BLACK CATS AND WITCHES BREW THIS HALLOWEEN PARTY INVITATION IS FOR YOU!
Please join us for a little cocktail and good cheer!
Christmas time is near, and we can\'t wait to share our happiness. Please join us for a jolly good dinner at Christmas.
We look forward to celebrate with you!Please join us on a Dinner!
Let\'s get together and have a party blast!Please join us on a dinner and cocktail!
To share our happiness. Please join us on the Cocktail, Dinner and Dancing!
Christmas Party at our house! Eggnog, snacks and reindeer games
It’s time again for Christmas Cheer! Let us gather again and celebrate with loved ones so dear!
Please join us on the sweetest celebration!You\'re invited on a Party.
It’s Halloween Time and We’re Having a Bash so Wear Your Best Costume To Our Fun Monster Mash

We invite you to celebrate the Party!Please join us on the event.

Merry Christmas to all! Wishing you joy and good tidings! Please join, as we rejoice in our Lord and Savior.
PLEASE JOIN US FOR PUMPKIN STEW AND WITCHES BREW!
Request the honour of your presence on the party. Please come and join us!
You are cordially invited to an evening of Christmas celebration dinner and caroling.
It’s the most wonderful time of the year! Join us for a celebration of Christmas goodwill and cheer!

array.name: ContentBirthday
array.item: Join us for music, fun great food to eat. You\'re invited for birthday fun.This is a party you just can\'t skip.
Raise your glass and lend a cheer, My birthday is almost here. To have a guest like you would be a wonderful delight so please join us on this magical night.
It\'s my birthday and the time to have tons of fun and delight! Do join in the festivities and enjoy the happy times together!
Please be my guest at my birthday! We\'re having a party and hope you\'re coming!
You are cordially invited for Dinner and Drinks to celebrate B\'day bash.
It\'s time to cheer when friends are near to lift up a toast for me come and join me in my birthday party.
You are invited to join my birthday party let\'s have fun on the Big Day!
With the great joy, we invite you to share in B\'day celebration Dinner and Dancing.
Can\'t believe he has grown up so much! It\'s his 21st birthday, so please join us for a disco party.
I guess it\'s time to be rebellious And celebrate this transcendence With lots of fun But not without your presence.
Guess what? Another year has passed.Join us for a party as my mum is turning sixty.

array.name: ContentKidsBirthday
array.item: There will be a birthday cake and, there\'ll be a clown Let\'s spread the news cross the town Our little one is turning five Please join us for fun and jive!
We will celebrate the birthday out in the sun with food, music and magic, It will be fun. We invite you to our son\'s birthday party!
Our little son/daughter is turning one Hope you\'ll be there to wish him/her a year full of fun!
Every year this day brings most happiness to us. It is our kid\'s birthday and you all are invited!
It seems like yesterday that our little one was born. Please join us for the grand celebration of the first birthday.
Join us for music, fun great food to eat. You\'re invited for birthday fun.This is a party you just can\'t skip.
It\'s my birthday and the time to have tons of fun and delight! Do join in the festivities and enjoy the happy times together!
Balloons and whistles, chocolates and candy, our darling is turning three. We are icing the birthday cake You are invited to celebrate!
Mickey mouse and Winnie the Pooh Our sweetie is turning two. Please join us to make it a grand celebration!
Please be my guest at my birthday! We\'re having a party and hope you\'re coming!
I learned to laugh and squeal, then sit and stand.Now I can walk if you hold my hand.B Come celebrate our buckaroo, (Name) is turning TWO!
You are invited to join my birthday party of our Prince let\'s have fun on the Big Daut the fun has only just begun....Look out, I\'m turning ONE!
Calling all cowboys, spurs, ropes & cowboy hats. Saddle up Don\'t forget your chaps!y!
You\'re warmly invited to our baby\'s First Birthday celebration!.
You\'re invited to celebrate the first birthday of our son, (name of the celebrator).
With the great joy, we invite you to share in B\'day celebration Dinner and Dancing.It\'s My Baby\'s Birthday.
Not a year more, not a year less, (name of the celebrator) is turning three.Please come and make the celebration a memorable one for him/her.
There is not one but two birthday parties as our twins will celebrate their birthdays on (date). Please come for the double celebration.
Our little princess is turning three and we are organizing a fun tea party in her honor. You are cordially invited to it.
Come help us celebrate the special day with a cheerful party You\'re warmly invited to our baby\'s First Birthday celebration!
I guess it\'s time to be rebellious And celebrate this transcendence With lots of fun But not without your presence.

To celebrate this special moment, we invite you to join us for food, music, and celebrations.

array.item: We request the honor of your presence on our marriage.
We request the pleasure of your company to celebrate our wedding.
Two loving heart are getting united and making a promise to be in love forever!
Save the date as you\'re invited on our wedding!
I have found the one whom my soul loves. And we’re going to tie the knots and request the pleasure of your presence on our Wedding.
